subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Miguel Cabrera was the first player to win the triple crown in 45 years, and San Francisco’s Buster Posey was the first catcher to win the National League batting title in 70 years.
snippet: Detroit’s Miguel Cabrera was the first player to win the triple crown in 45 years, and San Francisco’s Buster Posey was the first catcher to win the National League batting title in 70 years.
